title: Killing demonic gorillas

properties.name: description
properties.value: The profit rate assumes 50 kills per hour. Your actual profits may be higher or lower depending on your speed and luck.

content:
Killing demonic gorillas
Requirements
Skills
  • 80+
  • 75+ , ,
  • 43+
  • 69+
Items
  • Weapons: Arclight, Toxic Blowpipe for ranged switch
  • Armour: Barrows equipment or better
  • Food & Potions: Sharks, Divine super combat potions, Prayer potions, Divine ranging potions
    • Quest
    Monkey Madness II completed
    Other
    King's Ransom to use Piety
    Black demon slayer task to enable usage of Arclight and a Slayer helm (recommended)
    Results
    ProfitExperience gained
    2,921,718 81,700 25,708 20,425
    Inputs (350,630)Outputs (3,272,348)
    3 × Divine super combat potion(4) (56,145)3 × Divine ranging potion(4) (11,835)8 × Prayer potion(4) (80,120)30 × Shark (25,980)800 × Zulrah's scales (127,200)150 × Amethyst dart (49,350)0.17 × Zenyte shard (2,270,143)0.1 × Ballista limbs (3,418)0.1 × Ballista spring (3,337)0.067 × Light frame (1,981)0.033 × Heavy frame (5,821)0.033 × Monkey tail (11,503)219 × Death rune (41,125)219 × Law rune (28,438)125 × Rune javelin heads (73,125)313 × Runite bolts (65,625)4.5 × Runite bar (55,967)12 × Adamantite bar (24,060)6 × Watermelon seed (78)0.44 × Torstol seed (27,011)0.4 × Teak seed (19.6)0.6 × Ranarr seed (26,793)0.4 × Willow seed (239)0.14 × Papaya tree seed (525)0.2 × Palm tree seed (7,288)0.56 × Snapdragon seed (51,179)0.36 × Yew seed (19,803)0.36 × Mahogany seed (600)0.36 × Maple seed (6,440)0.24 × Magic seed (33,212)4.5 × Grimy cadantine (8,560)5.62 × Grimy kwuarm (9,730)4.5 × Grimy dwarf weed (4,950)3.38 × Grimy lantadyme (5,429)2.5 × Saradomin brew(2) (9,413)8.5 × Diamond (15,700)2,500 × Javelin shaft (2,500)1 × Dragon scimitar (59,826)2 × Rune chainbody (58,992)3.5 × Rune platelegs (132,304)3.5 × Rune plateskirt (132,594)75 × Dragon javelin heads (74,625)

    The profit rate assumes 50 kills per hour. Your actual profits may be higher or lower depending on your speed and luck.

    Demonic Gorillas drop zenyte shards, required to create powerful zenyte jewellery. Zenyte shards are the large majority of profit from demonic gorillas. With the shards dropping at a rate of 1/300, demonic gorillas are an inconsistent money maker, despite the shards being valued at 13,620,856 coins.

    The average demonic gorilla kill is worth 66,721 coins. While average profit per hour may be high, actual profit per hour depends greatly on whether zenyte shards are received. If the player does not receive a shard, the average kill is worth only 21,318 coins and the baseline profit is much lower at about 509,647 coins per hour. These rates assume decent gear and recommended stats. However, it is possible to achieve 60+ kill per hour when on a Slayer task with sufficient Arclight charges. As zenyte drops are rare and optimal rates require a slayer task, players seeking consistent profit often prefer to kill other bosses such as Zulrah or Vorkath.

    For strategies, see Demonic gorilla/Strategies.

    Due to constantly changing prices on the Grand Exchange, some information in this article may or may not be current.
    It is strongly recommended to check the live prices on the Grand Exchange before making large investments in any method.
    All prices on this page are cached, meaning it is possible that they appear out of date.
    To force a new cache of this page, click this link.
    If a money making method is out of date, you can edit it or leave a message on the talk page.

drop [[zenyte shard]]s, required to create powerful [[zenyte#Crafted_and_enchanted_goods|zenyte jewellery]]. Zenyte shards are the large majority of profit from demonic gorillas. With the shards dropping at a rate of 1/300, demonic gorillas are an inconsistent money maker, despite the shards being valued at {{Nocoins|{{GEP|Zenyte shard}} round 0|c}}. The average demonic gorilla kill is worth {{Nocoins|{{#var:oneDemonLoot}} round 0|c}}. While average profit per hour may be high, actual profit per hour depends greatly on whether zenyte shards are received. If the player does not receive a shard, the average kill is worth only {{Nocoins|{{#var:demonUniq}}+{{#var:demonReg}} round 0|c}} and the baseline profit is much lower at about {{Nocoins|{{#var:default_kph}}*({{#var:demonUniq}}+{{#var:demonReg}})-{{#var:costs}} round 0|c}} per hour. These rates assume decent gear and recommended stats. However, it is possible to achieve 60+ kill per hour when on a [[Slayer task]] with sufficient [[Arclight]] charges. As zenyte drops are rare and optimal rates require a slayer task, players seeking consistent profit often prefer to kill other bosses such as [[Money making guide/Killing Zulrah|Zulrah]] or [[Money making guide/Killing Vorkath|Vorkath]]. For strategies, see [[Demonic gorilla/Strategies]]. }} {{Money making}} [[Category:MMG/Combat]]
